attributes.action: gordon has made a mess of tax credits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tax credits are a disaster for the working population with most people i know repaying them !!!!!!!but it's our fault of course ! NOT THEIRS !!!!WE ONLY SUPPLY THE FACTS .. THE REST THEY MAKE UP . at the end of the day we dont have mortgage relief or marraige allowance anymore , just a system in place that makes an allowance then decides woops that wasnt right ... you owe us £???S and thats the way it goes for year after year . by the time our kids have left home how much will we owe ?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
